summary: Updated CLAUDE.md and project-overview.md to accurately describe this NixOS dotfiles repository. Changed title from 'Neovim Configuration Management System' to 'NixOS Dotfiles Configuration System', replaced fictional nvim/ directory structure with actual repository structure (flake.nix, hosts/, packages/, etc.), and updated project-overview.md with NixOS/Home Manager technology stack and workflows.

artifacts.summary: Updated title, description, Project Structure, and Rules References
Complete rewrite for NixOS dotfiles with Nix flakes, multi-host support, and Home Manager

completion_data.completion_summary: Updated CLAUDE.md and project-overview.md to accurately describe NixOS dotfiles repository instead of fictional Neovim configuration. Changed title, project structure, technology stack, and development workflows to reflect actual flake-based NixOS/Home Manager configuration.
